How The Philadelphia Eagles, Pabst And Other Top Brands Are Tapping Into Live Content
My first Seattle Startup Week is in the books, and I'm already excited for next year!  Lee Reeves and I are already cooking up some good panel ideas

Thanks so much to Andy Zhulenev, Jim Salmon, Sheryl Maloney, Lisa Nelson, Terry Dell, Katy Greve, Michael Garrett, Irv Latta, and Brian Ardinger for speaking at the various #CorporateInnovation panels
Thanks to The Pioneer Collective and ATLAS Workbase for hosting our events
And a big thanks to Brandy Rhodes, Alexandra Charnas, and the rest of the organizing team for letting me take part and for spending the last few months herding cats to make all of this happen
Next up is the GeekWire Summit, and then maybe I can get back to doing my day job haha
Hard to top Terry Dell and Lisa Nelson when it comes to #CorporateInnovation.  I learned so much from them both as part of Seattle Startup Week
Shout out to Lee Reeves for asking the tough questions and to Christopher H. and The Pioneer Collective for hosting
The #CorporateInnovation track continues tonight at @ATLAS Workbase from 6-7 (http://sched.co/Bu7H)

The same, amazing Ivy Softworks team but now we can talk about our product! Read about it at www.atlas.coAtlas Informatics is a spin out from the Ivy Softworks Innovation Studio. Scheduled to debut in summer 2016, Atlas Recall, the company’s first product, helps you remember everything you’ve seen across all your favorite devices, apps, platforms and services. Atlas eliminates the time and energy you spend everyday searching, making the save button obsolete and taming the chaos of your digital life. The result: less time spent hunting and corralling data, and more time for thinking, creating, and being productive.

I am a full life cycle recruiter with a smoldering passion for people. My aim in my work is to deliver transparency, attention to detail, and feedback throughout the search process on both the candidate and client side. My primary responsibilities as director of recruiting at thinkspace are developing and implementing effective recruiting strategies that add value to the startup community.

recommendations: Senior Engagement Manager at DigiSignals Inc.,
April 25, 2016, Ajay worked with Grace but at different companies

Grace is one of the most energetic, inspiring, talented and driven professionals that I have ever met. Her ability to focus on the individual and his/her skills and aspirations makes Grace one of the most effective people persons. Her drive to results is not just inspiring but uplifting as well; her enthusiasm is infectious and her passion to help makes her an amazing friend and teammate. She makes your goals as her goals and focuses on one's success with the same vigor as she would apply to her own success (even more, maybe). The accolades that Grace has received is testament to her ability to reach out, lift up and inspire individuals to do better than ever and as a person who has immensely benefitted from her work ethos and approach to life, I am thankful to have had the opportunity to know and work with her. I wish Grace the very best in everything that she takes up and will always root for her continued success.

summary: My name is Grace Fox. I'm passionate about technology, productivity, startups, mid to large sized dogs, being left handed, learning how to do new things,  executing at 110%, and nurturing the spirit of mankind.
